column4: I was wondering if anyone could guide me through setting up a dual-head card (radeon)
so you want to setup two monitors in xinerama mode?
run fglrxconfig and choose the big desktop setting...it should be quite easy to do. make sure you know your monitor specs
do I need to download/apt-get a driver first?
you'll need to use the fglrx driver
it supports most radeons. i'm not sure if it supports one that old. i have a 9700 pro
you'll want to share the printer with CUPS on windows and then add
I think you have it backwards, the printer is attached to the ubuntu machine.. I want to print FROM the xp box
oh sorry. that's easy. you just have to add the printer in windows using the CUPS  URI
can you be a little more detailed
you add the printer using the URI in xp
